javaslang.control

Class Failure<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaslang.control.Failure<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - component type of this Failure
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<T>, Foldable<T>, Functor<T>, Monad<T>, Try<T>, Value<T>, ValueModule.Iterable<T>, ValueModule.Printable

    public final class Failure<T>
extends Object
implements Try<T>, Serializable
    A failed Try.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Daniel Dietrich
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
